title: NBPGR Recruitment 2026 - Walk-in-Interview for 02 Young Professional Posts
description: National Bureau of Plant Genetic Resources (NBPGR) has declared the offcial notification for 2026. To fill up the 02 vacancies for Young Professional Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified for Any Degree can use this opportunity and apply for the NBPGR Recruitment 2026 . Here, we included the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, and application fee. and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can attend the walk-in at the address below. If you are ...
